st:Description.name: KnowledgeLanguage
st:Description.st:role: Defines some Language and Knowledge resources locations and behaviors
st:Description.st:detailedRole: Enable the user to deal with these categories of options: Language, Reference Directory for Types and Knowledge Environment

st:attribute.Name: ExtendedLanguage
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the packages the user wants to load
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Enables the user to select the packages he wants to load under Packages (if he wants to load a limited number of packages)

st:attribute.Name: AllPackages
st:attribute.st:role: Enables the user to select all packages
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Enables the user to select all packages

st:attribute.Name: OutputDirectoryForTypes
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the reference directory for types
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Enables you to save the CATGScript file in the Directory indicated in the Reference Directory for Types field for later re-user

st:attribute.Name: CATKnowledgeBuildPath
st:attribute.st:role: Enables you to select the directory containing Knowledge data
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Enables you to select the directory (Knowledge directory) containing Knowledge data
